content:
I am using FHIR with bluebutton CMS and i want to implement Sorting
https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#sort
I have checked this link , and tried to implement like that but it is not working , so which parameters i can pass in _sort
i want to sort by various columns containing identifier then date and some are amount columns we have
any one please help me that is that possible , somewhere i have read that sorting is not implemented yet
